add_points_to_collection.description: Insert a point (= embedding or vector + other infos) to a specific collection, if the collection does not exist it will be created

props.name: embeddingsIds
props.description: The ids of the embeddings for the points. If not provided, the ids will be generated automatically

props.name: distance
props.description: The calculation method helps to rank vectors when you want to find the closest points, the method to use depends on the model who's created the embeddings, see the documentation of your model

props.name: payload
props.description: Please follow [payload documentation](https://qdrant.tech/documentation/concepts/payload/) to add additional information to the points.

props.name: storage
props.description: Define where points will be stored

delete_collection.description: Delete a collection of your database

delete_points.description: Delete points of a specific collection

collection_infos.description: Get the all the infos of a specific collection

collection_list.description: Get the list of all the collections of your database

get_points.description: Get the points of a specific collection

search_points.description: Search for points closest to your given vector (= embedding)

props.name: vector
props.description: The vector (= embedding) you want to search for.

props.name: negativeVector
props.description: The vector (= embedding) you want to be the farthest.

props.name: limitResult
props.description: The max number of results you want to get.
